reviews.text:
Staff here at 313 attitude was very bad when I was asking about the products, and no patience to serve with bad moody and not willing to serve.
I told her will feed back to your company, she said " up to me" with loud and bad attitude.  Actually I want to buy Dried Strawberry, but due to her attitude, I walked away.
I ever went few of your shop, others was very good.

Their selection of dried fruits is diverse and delightful, with each variety leaving you wanting more! Personally, I'm a huge fan of their Mixed Fruit Crisps and Mixed Fruit Yogurt. It‚Äôs the perfect snack for binge-watching. For anyone who loves exploring healthy snacks, it is a must-try!

They have a wide variety of dried snacks, besides fruits, they also selling dried vege and nuts. I highly recommend the dried strawberry, each piece is plump, tangy, sweet and crispy. I couldn't resist putting them in my shopping basket after trying them! Initially, I wasn't fond of vegetables, but the staff recommended I try the okra and mushrooms, and I instantly fell in love. They didn't have the usual vegetable taste, and they were so crispy and delicious! The mushroom flavor even had a hint of saltiness, which is perfect for those who prefer savory snacks.

This is the first time I visited the shop which impressed me greatly , especially the staff Richard who‚Äôs very friendly and helpful that I would like to support him some products .. good job Richard üòÉ
A decent shop with a wide variety of snacks just next to 711, healthy and tasty. Service is great as well. Worth a visit
